definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: The positive and negative charges are then separated by updrafts and gravity, producing the electric field.
sentences.chinese: 正負電荷受上升氣流與重力的影響而分離，產生電場。

sentences.english: If the electric field added is unchangeable , what produces is the direct current.
sentences.chinese: 如果所加的電場不變，產生的是直流電。

sentences.english: A composite formula for calculation of horizontal electric field generated by return stroke current is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種計算地閃回擊電流水平電場的混合法。

sentences.english: The magnetic field is in a direction perpendicular to electric field of the cathode sheath.
sentences.chinese: 磁場垂直於陰極鞘層中電場的方問。

sentences.english: He had an inherent interest in induced current and in the induction field.
sentences.chinese: 他對感應電流和感應電場有着內在的興趣。

sentences.english: If that occurred, the ratfish might learn to turn around on its own when I flipped the switch only.
sentences.chinese: 果若如此，當我打開電場時，鼠魚也許就會自己轉向。

sentences.english: The electric and magnetic field shows the similar distribution on a plane in the far field.
sentences.chinese: 任何電流源遠場面上之電場與磁場呈現相似之分佈。

sentences.english: The electric field was simulated by electric potential equation.
sentences.chinese: 電場由電勢方程近似反映，只考慮周向自感應磁場。

sentences.english: In total, China will build seven of these mega-wind farms.
sentences.chinese: 中國將總共建造7座類似容量的風電場。

sentences.english: Electric field distributions and the equation of motion ofthe particles near axis in RFQ Linac are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了它的近軸區內高頻電場的分佈及粒子運動方程。

sentences.english: E-field distribution are similar on spheres at different radius. (4).
sentences.chinese: 電流陣列在不同半徑場球面上之電場分佈相同。

sentences.english: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.chinese: 然後，太陽風產生的電場將帶電粒子一掃而空。

sentences.english: At high external field, the polyampholyte chain is more extended.
sentences.chinese: 電場強度較高時，兩性聚離子鏈構型更爲舒展。

sentences.english: The displacement current corresponding to a variable irrotational electric field does not excite any magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 對應於可變有源無旋電場的位移電流不激發磁場。

sentences.english: Airtightness as well as uniform electric field is of great importance to the stability of the electrolysis system.
sentences.chinese: 密封性以及均勻電場對電解體系的穩定性十分重要。

sentences.english: Hence, only one field line can pass through each point of the field.
sentences.chinese: 因而，在每一點處只能通過一條電場線。
